00047 void
00048 ConnectionManager::add(const sockaddr_in &addr, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00049                        const char *service_name, DispatchHandlerPtr &handler) {
00050   ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00051   SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr> iter;
00052   ConnectionState *conn_state;
00053 
00054   if (m_impl->conn_map.find(addr) != m_impl->conn_map.end())
00055     return;
00056 
00057   conn_state = new ConnectionState();
00058   conn_state->connected = false;
00059   conn_state->addr = addr;
00060   memset(&conn_state->local_addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00061   conn_state->timeout_ms = timeout_ms;
00062   conn_state->handler = handler;
00063   conn_state->service_name = (service_name) ? service_name : "";
00064   boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00065 
00066   m_impl->conn_map[addr] = ConnectionStatePtr(conn_state);
00067 
00068   {
00069     ScopedLock conn_lock(conn_state->mutex);
00070     send_connect_request(conn_state);
00071   }
00072 }

00075 void
00076 ConnectionManager::add(const sockaddr_in &addr, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00077                        const char *service_name) {
00078   DispatchHandlerPtr null_disp_handler;
00079   add(addr, timeout_ms, service_name, null_disp_handler);
00080 }

00120 bool
00121 ConnectionManager::wait_for_connection(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00122                                        uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00123   Timer timer(max_wait_ms, true);
00124   return wait_for_connection(addr, timer);
00125 }

00127 
00128 bool
00129 ConnectionManager::wait_for_connection(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00130                                        Timer &timer) {
00131   ConnectionStatePtr conn_state_ptr;
00132 
00133   {
00134     ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00135     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00136         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00137     if (iter == m_impl->conn_map.end())
00138       return false;
00139     conn_state_ptr = (*iter).second;
00140   }
00141 
00142   {
00143     boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock(conn_state_ptr->mutex);
00144     boost::xtime drop_time;
00145 
00146     while (!conn_state_ptr->connected) {
00147       boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00148       xtime_add_millis(drop_time, timer.remaining());
00149       if (!conn_state_ptr->cond.timed_wait(conn_lock, drop_time))
00150         return false;
00151     }
00152   }
00153 
00154   return true;
00155 }

00168 void
00169 ConnectionManager::send_connect_request(ConnectionState *conn_state) {
00170   int error;
00171   DispatchHandlerPtr handler(this);
00172 
00173   if (conn_state->local_addr.sin_port != 0)
00174     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, conn_state->local_addr,
00175                                   handler);
00176   else
00177     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, handler);
00178 
00179   if (error == Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED) {
00180     conn_state->connected = true;
00181     conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00182   }
00183   else if (error != Error::OK) {
00184     if (conn_state->service_name != "") {
00185       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to %s at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00186                 "again in %d milliseconds...", conn_state->service_name.c_str(),
00187                 conn_state->addr.format().c_str(), Error::get_text(error),
00188                 (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00189     }
00190     else {
00191       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to service at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00192                 "again in %d milliseconds...", conn_state->addr.format()
00193                 .c_str(), Error::get_text(error), (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00194     }
00195 
00196     // reschedule (throw in a little randomness)
00197     boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00198     xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, conn_state->timeout_ms);
00199 
00200     int32_t milli_adjust = System::rand32() % 2000;
00201     if (System::rand32() & 1)
00202       xtime_sub_millis(conn_state->next_retry, milli_adjust);
00203     else
00204       xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, milli_adjust);
00205 
00206     // add to retry heap
00207     m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00208     m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00209   }
00210 
00211 }

00213 
00214 int ConnectionManager::remove(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00215   bool do_close = false;
00216   int error = Error::OK;
00217 
00218   {
00219     ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00220     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00221         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00222 
00223     if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00224       ScopedLock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00225       if ((*iter).second->connected)
00226         do_close = true;
00227       else
00228         (*iter).second->connected = true;  // prevent further attempts
00229       m_impl->conn_map.erase(iter);
00230     }
00231   }
00232 
00233   if (do_close)
00234     error = m_impl->comm->close_socket(addr);
00235 
00236   return error;
00237 }

00251 void
00252 ConnectionManager::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00253   ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00254   SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00255       m_impl->conn_map.find(event_ptr->addr);
00256 
00257   if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00258     ScopedLock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00259     ConnectionState *conn_state = (*iter).second.get();
00260 
00261     if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00262       conn_state->connected = true;
00263       conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00264     }
00265     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR ||
00266              event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00267       if (!m_impl->quiet_mode) {
00268         HT_INFOF("%s; Problem connecting to %s, will retry in %d "
00269                  "milliseconds...", event_ptr->to_str().c_str(),
00270                  conn_state->service_name.c_str(), (int)conn_state->timeout_ms);
00271       }
00272       conn_state->connected = false;
00273       // this logic could proably be smarter.  For example, if the last
00274       // connection attempt was a long time ago, then schedule immediately
00275       // otherwise, if this event is the result of an immediately prior connect
00276       // attempt, then do the following
00277       boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00278       xtime_add_millis(conn_state->next_retry, conn_state->timeout_ms);
00279 
00280       // add to retry heap
00281       m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00282       m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00283     }
00284 
00285     // Chain event to application supplied handler
00286     if (conn_state->handler)
00287       conn_state->handler->handle(event_ptr);
00288   }
00289   else {
00290     HT_WARNF("Unable to find connection for %s in map.",
00291              InetAddr::format(event_ptr->addr).c_str());
00292   }
00293 }
00294 
00295 
00299 void ConnectionManager::operator()() {
00300   ScopedLock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00301   ConnectionStatePtr conn_state;
00302 
00303   while (true) {
00304 
00305     while (m_impl->retry_queue.empty())
00306       m_impl->retry_cond.wait(lock);
00307 
00308     conn_state = m_impl->retry_queue.top();
00309 
00310     if (!conn_state->connected) {
00311       {
00312         ScopedLock conn_lock(conn_state->mutex);
00313         boost::xtime now;
00314         boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00315 
00316         if (xtime_cmp(conn_state->next_retry, now) <= 0) {
00317           m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00318           send_connect_request(conn_state.get());
00319           continue;
00320         }
00321       }
00322       m_impl->retry_cond.timed_wait(lock, conn_state->next_retry);
00323     }
00324     else
00325       m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00326   }
00327 }
